resources.string:
A Simple Body Mass Index Calculator which provides custom health information based on the result, simply enter your
Height and weight then click calculate. Your Body Mass Index will be determined along wth its interpretation along with it. A diet and Exercise plan will then be generated based on the result.
This app is for educational purposes and was designed as a android project, the advice in this app should not be taken as medial advice. consult yout GP before doing any of these exercises
